properties.areaDesc: Pamlico and Pungo Rivers; Neuse and Bay Rivers
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 5 at 6:50AM EST until January 5 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...STRONG WINDS AND HAZARDOUS SEAS CONTINUE TODAY...
...LOW WATER CONDITIONS THIS MORNING ON THE TIDAL RIVERS...

.Strong winds this morning will push water to the eastern side of
the Pamlico Sound, creating low water conditions along the tidal
rivers west of the Pamlico Sound. Conditions will gradually
improve today into this evening with diminishing winds and
subsiding seas as high pressure builds in from the west.

* WHAT...For the Low Water Advisory, abnormally low water
levels. For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 25
kt with gusts up to 30 kt and rough waters.

* WHERE...Pamlico, Pungo, Neuse, and Bay Rivers.

* WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Below
normal water levels will result in hazardous navigating
conditions.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...LOW WATER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
